description:
Toasty warm, super packable. Designed with a nod to the classic Bush Pilot Jacket from our 1990 catalogue, which was originally made to “take the chill off evenings in the hills.” One huge upgrade? This edition uses recycled down, which gives performance down new life (and keeps it out of the landfill). Plus, bluesign® approved fabrics keep the footprint to a minimum.

  • Super packable and warm 700-fill-power down
  • RENU:700 performance recycled down is reclaimed from post-consumer products (like bedding or pillows) to keep quality materials out of the landfill
  • Recycled nylon with PFC-free DWR treatment to shed light rain
  • Coast Rapids Print inspired by the 1990 MEC summer catalogue cover shot from Skookumchuck Narrows, BC
  • Includes stuff sack with a small carabiner to clip it to your pack on the move
  • Zippered side pockets
  • Unisex sizing; check size chart for measurements
name: MEC Classic Bush Pilot Down Sweater - Unisex
